PIONEER.title: Invasion
PIONEER.description: Your Vanguard and Guard Operators gain <@ba.vup>{lv1.cost}</> DP on kill; partner gains up to 25 DP on request

CASTER.title: Offence
CASTER.description: Your Caster and Sniper Operators ignore <@ba.vup>{lv1.magic_resist_penetrate_fixed}</> RES and <@ba.vup>{lv1.def_penetrate:0%}</> DEF when attacking enemies blocked by your partner

MEDIC.title: Defence
MEDIC.description: Your Medic and Defender Operators gain <@ba.vup>{lv1.def:0%}</> more DEF, and the healing effects on partner's units increase to <@ba.vup>{lv1.heal_scale:0%}</>

SUPPORT.title: Support
SUPPORT.description: Units in your Supporter and Specialist Operators' attack range recover <@ba.vup>+{lv1.sp_recovery_per_sec}</> SP every second

SNIPER.title: Offence
SNIPER.description: Your Caster and Sniper Operators ignore <@ba.vup>{lv1.magic_resist_penetrate_fixed}</> RES and <@ba.vup>{lv1.def_penetrate:0%}</> DEF when attacking enemies blocked by your partner

WARRIOR.title: Invasion
WARRIOR.description: Your Vanguard and Guard Operators gain <@ba.vup>{lv1.cost}</> DP on kill; partner gains up to 25 DP on request

TANK.title: Defence
TANK.description: Your Medic and Defender Operators gain <@ba.vup>{lv1.def:0%}</> more DEF, and the healing effects on partner's units increase to <@ba.vup>{lv1.heal_scale:0%}</>

SPECIAL.title: Support
SPECIAL.description: Units in your Supporter and Specialist Operators' attack range recover <@ba.vup>+{lv1.sp_recovery_per_sec}</> SP every second

NONE.title: Coordination
NONE.description: All Operators gain <@ba.vup>{lv1.atk:0%}</> more ATK, DEF and Max HP

cooperate_kazimierz_buff.description: Kazimierz Operators gain +20% ATK for 30 seconds after deployment

cooperate_buff_spareshot.description: 50% probability to consume 0 ammo when an operator attacks

cooperate_buff_student.description: When an Ursus Operator uses a skill, other Ursus Operators gain 10 SP

MY_SIDE.name: My Objective Point
MY_SIDE.description: You lose Life Points if an enemy enters; when its Life Points reach zero, the entered enemy will appear at the Partner's Objective Point

MATE_SIDE.name: Partner's Objective Point
MATE_SIDE.description: The partner loses Life Points if an enemy enters; when its Life Points reach zero, the entered enemy will appear at My Objective Point

SHARED.name: Shared Objective Point
SHARED.description: Both players lose Life Points if an enemy enters
